name: reverse-chemistry
title: Reverse Chemistry: compression from gas to heavy oil
author: AivanF
description:
Provides reverse recipes for compression:
- Methane gas (if SE is installed) =>
- Petroleum gas (aka propane gas) =>
- Light oil =>
- Heavy oil.

Meant to be not cheaty, it's totally resource inefficient in a basic workflow, but can be greatly useful with mods that provide excess production of one resource. Configurable with startup settings: enable or disable any new recipe.
